description: This file contains unit tests for the 'universalinit' project, specifically testing the 'ExpressTemplate' and project initialization workflows, including configuration loading, template processing, and post-processing execution.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and template files.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a mock project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_express_init_info
methods.description: Verifies that the template's initial information is correctly retrieved.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process, including directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Checks that post-processing scripts are executed properly.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Validates loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Ensures template variables are correctly replaced in files during project setup.
